title: Antitrust limits practices that build market power

content.question: Antitrust laws are designed to maintain a competitive market environment by

choices.label: preventing monopolies from generating negative externalities
limiting practices that increase a firm’s market power
imposing price ceilings on products produced by monopolies
making charging a price above marginal cost illegal

content.answer: limiting practices that increase a firm’s market power
